name: Last Pilot (Rasmus Clausen)
description:
The world has been taken over by aliens, and as the last pilot you will have to fight for your life.
you have an energy shield that shrinks over time, shoot aliens to recharge it and make sure that you stay inside.

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Space to shoot

The game was made for the ludum dare 42 jam in under 72 hours
